docs.snippet: Jeff Ireland is out after six seasons as general manager of the Miami Dolphins, who failed to reach the playoffs the past five years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeff Ireland is out after six seasons as general manager of the Miami Dolphins, who failed to reach the playoffs the past five years.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Miami Dolphins decide to part ways with general manager Jeff Ireland, who failed to reach the playoffs in past five years; other football news noted.

headline.main: Dolphins Cut Ties With General Manager
headline.print_headline: Dolphins Cut Ties With General Manager

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and KEN BELSON

docs.snippet: Some players insist the $760 million proposed settlement by the N.F.L. is too small while others say that ailing former players need help now....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some players insist the $760 million proposed settlement by the N.F.L. is too small while others say that ailing former players need help now.
docs.abstract: Doubts linger over NFL's proposed $760 settlement, with many former players insisting it is too small and that ailing former players need immediate payouts and medical benefits; key to settlement, which may not be available to those who choose to opt out, is that players will not have to prove current neurocognitive ailments were caused by concussions sustained during NFL play.

headline.main: Doubts Linger Over N.F.L. Concussion Settlement

docs.snippet: Auburn left tackle Greg Robinson said he was leaving for the N.F.L. draft....
docs.lead_paragraph: Auburn left tackle Greg Robinson said he was leaving for the N.F.L. draft.
docs.abstract: Auburn University sophomore left tackle Greg Robinson announces that he is leaving school for the NFL draft; other college football news noted.

docs.snippet: The Bowl Championship Series, debated and ridiculed during its existence, produced a thrilling last act before a new playoff system took over....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Bowl Championship Series, debated and ridiculed during its existence, produced a thrilling last act before a new playoff system took over.
docs.abstract: College Football's Bowl Championship Series, debated and ridiculed since its inception in 1997, has produced a thrilling last act culminating in Florida State's victory over Auburn; system will be replaced by a four-team playoff.

headline.main: The End of the Much-Debated B.C.S.

docs.snippet: Researchers in Florida believe they have come up with a low-cost way to improve football helmets and better protect players against the glancing blows that experts say contribute to most concussions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers in Florida believe they have come up with a low-cost way to improve football helmets and better protect players against the glancing blows that experts say contribute to most concussions.

headline.main: Florida Researchers Developing Football Helmets to Reduce Concussions
headline.print_headline: Florida Researchers Developing Football Helmets to Reduce Concussions

docs.snippet: Former Germany midfielder Thomas Hitzlsperger has become one of the few high profile sportsmen, and the first well-known footballer from his country, to publicly reveal that he is gay....

docs.snippet: The Super Bowl will be played in New Jersey, but folks coming in for the big game on Feb. 2 are likely to spend time across the Hudson River in New York City, if only to check out a 14-block "Super Bowl Boulevard" set up along Broadway....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Super Bowl will be played in New Jersey, but folks coming in for the big game on Feb. 2 are likely to spend time across the Hudson River in New York City, if only to check out a 14-block "Super Bowl Boulevard" set up along Broadway.

headline.main: NYC Attractions Beckon Super Bowl Visitors
headline.print_headline: NYC Attractions Beckon Super Bowl Visitors

docs.snippet: FIFA general secretary Jerome Valcke said on Wednesday that the 2022 football World Cup finals will not be played in the summer months. Valcke said the tournament would probably be played at some point between November 15 and January 15....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA general secretary Jerome Valcke said on Wednesday that the 2022 football World Cup finals will not be played in the summer months. Valcke said the tournament would probably be played at some point between November 15 and January 15.

headline.main: Factbox: Average Temperatures in World Cup Hosts Qatar
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Average Temperatures in World Cup Hosts Qatar

docs.snippet: Prosecutors will drop a misdemeanor charge against an Ohio school principal indicted by a grand jury in November as part of a larger investigation into the rape of a teenage girl that drew national attention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors will drop a misdemeanor charge against an Ohio school principal indicted by a grand jury in November as part of a larger investigation into the rape of a teenage girl that drew national attention.
